place.name: PODIMORE
place.gazetteerText: MILTON-PODIMORE, a parish, with a village, in Yeovil district, Somerset: 2 miles NE of Ilchester, and 6½ NNW of Yeovil r. station. Post town, Ilchester, under Taunton. Acres, 990. Real property, £1,357. Pop., 131. Houses, 25. The manor belongs to G. D. W. Digby, Esq. The living is a rectory in the diocese of Bath and Wells. Value, £200. Patron, the Rev. A. Highton. The church is early English, and has an octagonal tower. (In 1870-72, John Marius Wilson's Imperial Gazetteer of England and Wales)
